summary: Infrastructure health check completed. 28 containers running, 1 unhealthy (GitLab initializing), 1 without health check (Backstage). Core services healthy. Monitoring stack operational but missing container metrics exporters.
architecture: Multi-service Docker Compose infrastructure with Traefik reverse proxy, Infisical secrets management, PostgreSQL/MySQL databases, Redis cache, and 20+ application services. Monitoring via Prometheus/Grafana/Loki stack. Services organized by domain: freqkflag.co (infrastructure), cultofjoey.com (personal), twist3dkinkst3r.com (community).
current_phase: Operational - Services deployed and running. GitLab initializing (first boot). Monitoring gaps identified requiring automation.
key_findings: 28 containers running, 27 healthy, 1 unhealthy (GitLab - expected during initialization)
Backstage container lacks health check definition (shows 'running' not 'healthy')
No container metrics exporters deployed (cAdvisor, postgres_exporter, mysqld_exporter, redis_exporter missing)
Prometheus configured but cannot scrape database metrics (exporters not deployed)
Prometheus Docker metrics endpoint configured but Docker metrics API not enabled
Alertmanager configured with email notifications but SMTP not configured
Health check script exists but not automated (manual execution only)
GitLab health check failing during initialization (normal for first boot, 5-10 minute process)
blockers: GitLab initialization in progress (expected, 5-10 minute first boot)
Container metrics not available (cAdvisor/exporter services not deployed)
Database metrics not available (postgres_exporter, mysqld_exporter not deployed)
Alertmanager email notifications not functional (SMTP not configured)
recurring_issues: Backstage health check missing (container shows 'running' not 'healthy')
Manual health check execution required (no automated monitoring)
Prometheus scrape targets configured but exporters not deployed
